scripts.build: npx parcel build index.js --out-file benefit.js; cp _redirects dist/
scripts.watch: NODE_ENV=development npx parcel watch index.js --out-file benefit.js --no-cache

name: benefit-js
description: BenefitJS allows you to seamlessly accept Debit Card payments in Bahrain
author: BenefitJS <github@benefitjs.com>
